definition: clear/distinct/to understand thoroughly/to be clear about
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
distinct/clear/orderly/pain/suffering/deciduous bush used in Chinese medicine (genus Vitex)/punishment cane (old)
surname Chu/abbr. for Hubei 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] and Hunan 湖南省[Hu2 nan2 Sheng3] provinces together/Chinese kingdom during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (722-221 BC)

sentences.english: When her statement was read a very cleat light was cast upon the situation.
sentences.chinese: 她的聲明宣讀後，情況便顯得非常清楚了。

sentences.english: Iclear own this do not have the ability robel.
sentences.chinese: 我自己清楚自己更本沒有能力逆天。

sentences.english: Scientists don't yet know what the effects of those reactions might be.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們還不清楚這些反應會具體產生什麼樣的結果。

sentences.english: If we think about it, wind chill is an ill-defined concept.
sentences.chinese: 仔細想來，風寒是一個定義不清楚的概念。

sentences.english: I'll call right now to find it out.
Now you can know exactly how much change is in the pig.
sentences.chinese: 現在，你可以清楚地知道你的儲錢罐裏存了多少錢了。

sentences.english: He can't say why he decided to become a writer.
sentences.chinese: 他也說不清楚自已是何時決定要當作家的。

sentences.english: Sorry. I've no idea about it.
The Indians know full well that China expects obedience from its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 印度人清楚地知道，中國希望其鄰國乖乖地服從領導。

sentences.english: And when it was made plain who Kino was, the doctor grew stern and judicious at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 弄清楚誰是吉納後，醫生變得嚴肅認真而又明智起來。

sentences.english: Even the consequences of glacier retreat are poorly understood.
sentences.chinese: 人們甚至對冰川退縮的後果也不太清楚。

sentences.english: Understanding your hardware and its energy usage.
sentences.chinese: 清楚你的硬件及其能量使用。

sentences.english: It is unclear how the stores procure the Apple merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 目前還不清楚這些商店是如何獲得蘋果的商品。

sentences.english: Culture is a difficult concept to pin down.
sentences.chinese: 文化是一個非常難講清楚的概念。

sentences.english: The creature is unable to see well because of overstimulation of the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 生物因爲雙眼的刺激而無法清楚視物。

definition: to know/to become aware of/also pr. [zhi1 dao5]
to figure out how to do something
to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
